summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5455 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from Thurman Street to a point approximately 450 feet south thereof; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 69080, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
